title: BI-utvecklare
description:
**Allt vi gör, gör vi för Umeå**


Våra energi-och kommunikationslösningar spelar stor roll i våra kunders vardag. Varje dag. Hos oss arbetar du med samhällsviktiga tjänster, där du är en del i utvecklingen av en hållbar region. Vi erbjuder dig en varierad yrkesroll, där du får goda möjligheter att utvecklas och växa tillsammans med oss samtidigt som du kan bibehålla balansen mellan arbete och fritid. Självklart ingår en rad förmåner, med fokus på att du ska må bra.
  

  

IT-avdelningen arbetar med att säkerställa våra leveranser till företagets kunder genom att förvalta och utveckla systemstöd till alla våra olika delar i företaget. Energibranschen står inför många utmaningar, en av de mest intressanta är att vi ska bli klimatneutrala och fossilfria. För att möta utmaningarna har vår IT avdelning växt och nu söker vi dig som vill vara med på resan! Läs mer här.


**Om rollen:**


Som BI-utvecklare hos oss på Umeå Energi arbetar du som en del av ett litet, tight utvecklingsteam som arbetar enligt agila utvecklingsmetoder. Teamet består av en produktägare och utvecklare. Som BI-utvecklare arbetar du både med att förstå kraven och behoven såväl som att realisera dem i användbara lösningar. Som en del av detta tighta team behöver man ha förmågan att stundtals sätta sig in i projekt och uppgifter för att lösa problem självständigt samtidigt som man är en del av arbetet i tvärfunktionella grupper behöver man vara bekväm i att kommunicera och samarbeta med andra. Tillsammans utvecklar vi Umeå Energis datalager och skapar förutsättningar för bättre analys och beslutsstöd för alla verksamheter inom företaget i vår ambition att bli ett mer datadrivet företag.


Du har många kontakter med våra kollegor på de avdelningar som använder sig av den funktionalitet som teamet utvecklar. Du har även kontakter med våra leverantörer och med externa konsulter som vi samarbetar med.  

  



**För att lyckas i rollen har du:**


* Universitetsutbildning med relevant inriktning för systemutveckling exempelvis inom systemvetenskap eller datavetenskap eller annan utbildning som vi tillsammans med arbetslivserfarenhet bedömer som relevant.
* Några års arbetslivserfarenhet med inriktning mot datalager.
* Förmåga att omsätta krav och behovsmodeller till lösningar i praktiken.
* Goda erfarenheter av Microsoft SQL Server eller motsvarande/liknande.
* Erfarenhet inom Microsoft SSIS och SSAS eller motsvarande/liknande.

**Meriterande för rollen:**


* Certifikat inom Microsoft stacken.
* Vana av att arbeta med agila utvecklingsmetoder.
* Kunskaper inom SSRS och Power BI.
* Erfarenhet av utvecklingsarbete med stöd av Azure DevOps.

  

**Personliga egenskaper**:
Vi söker dig som är en lagspelare då arbetet sker i funktionella team tillsammans med bland annat lösningsarkitekter, testare och deltagare från verksamheter med funktionsbehov som digitaliseras. Vi tror att du har förmågan att på ett strukturerat sätt beskriva, modellera, visualisera och analysera komplexa strukturer, skeenden och samband. Att du kan tänka i flera abstraktionsnivåer, från en grov konceptuell nivå, ner till detaljer samt förmågan att omsätta dessa abstraktionsnivåer i mjukvarukonstruktion. Vidare tror vi att du har ett öppet sinne, god kommunikationsförmåga samt ett starkt engagemang och stor drivkraft.


Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper!


**Välkommen med din ansökan senast: 2024-10-25.**


För mer information om tjänsten kontakta gärna rekryterande Anna Wedholm 070-1448883. För frågor gällande rekryteringsprocessen kontakta HR-strateg, Susanne Sundstén, 0761475887. Fackliga företrädare når du via vår växel, 090-16 00 00.


Intervjuer kan komma att ske under ansökningstiden.


Som samhällsviktig verksamhet är det viktigt för oss med en trygg arbetsmiljö för våra medarbetare samt att våra tillgångar och information är skyddade. Som ett led i vårt systematiska säkerhetsarbete genomför vi därför en bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidaten för den här tjänsten. Några av våra roller kräver säkerhetsprövning, om det är aktuellt för tjänsten du sökt så kommer du att få mer information kring det i ett senare skede.


Vi undanber oss samtal från säljare av rekryterings- och annonslösningar. Vi har gjort vårt val av kanaler.


På jobb.umeaenergi.se kan du läsa mer om våra drivkrafter och utmaningar, samt ta del av några av våra medarbetares vardag.

title: Senior Frontend-utvecklare
description:
Vi söker en Senior Frontend-utvecklare till Trafikmyndighet i Stockholm.


Detta är ett konsultuppdrag. Du kommer vara anställd av Centio Consulting Group AB och arbeta som konsult.


Tjänsten är på heltid.


Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.

**Uppdraget och Arbetsområde**


I myndighetens uppdrag ligger att bereda och verkställa beslut om inriktning och omfattning för en långsiktigt hållbar kollektivtrafik. Dessutom ansvarar de för styrning och uppföljning av trafikdrift samt upprätthållandet av infrastrukturens funktion, säkerhet och värde. Varje dag reser mer än 700 000 personer med den allmänna kollektivtrafiken, det vill säga resor med tunnelbana, bussar, pendeltåg och lokalbanor.

  

Gruppen digitala kanaler består av 60+ medarbetare fördelat över kanalerna App, webb och digitala skyltar. Gruppen arbetar enligt agila principer och med stor öppenhet och samarbete över kanalteam.  

  

I uppdraget ingår att utveckla webbaserade lösningar främst riktade mot SLs biljettsystem. En del av arbetet är att underhålla deras nuvarande system, men huvudfokus under kommande period är att utveckla och bredda erbjudandet för företagskunder.


Webbutveckling hos myndigheten bedrivs idag av fyra agila team. Tillsammans ansvaras för myndighetens samtliga webbsajter, som bl a sl.se, waxholmsbolaget.se och fardtjansten.regionstockholm.se. Teknikstacken är modern och förnyas kontinuerligt vid behov, den är huvudsakligen byggd kring en mikroarkitektur i backend och monorepo-struktur i frontend. Huvudsakligen arbetar myndigheten med React i frontend och .Net i backend, strävan är att arbeta i en cloudbaserad miljö i Azure så långt som möjligt. Inom frontend används ett eget komponentsystem underbyggt av ett designsystem baserat i Figma. Gruppen fokuserar utvecklingen på att skapa fristående, test och releasbara komponenter med hög kvalitet och prestanda och har en strävan att automatisera så stor del av arbetet som möjligt. Utvecklingsarbetet bedrivs av sammansvetsade team som strävar mot snabba releaser och en miljö där varje teammedlem känner sig delaktig i den gemensamma produktutvecklingen.


Din roll blir att stärka upp i det webbteam som arbetar med tjänster som e-handel, biljetthantering och kundprofil-sidor. De användare vi vänder oss mot är allt från resenärer i kollektivtrafiken som vill hantera sina biljetter till större företag som gör stora inköp för sina anställda. Utvecklingen är huvudsakligen feature-baserad då det sker mycket nyutveckling i detta skede.

 **Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**


Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom webbutveckling  

  

Minst 3 års erfarenhet av utveckling i ReactJS  

  

Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling med Typescript  

  

Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha jobbat med Git och CI/CD  

  

Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling med state management som tex Redux  

  

Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att utveckla mot WCAG  

  

Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att konfigurera och utveckla automatiska tester med t.ex. Jest/Jasmine/React Testing Library och/eller Cypress.io  

  

Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att konfigurera och utveckla automatiska tester med t.ex. Jest/Jasmine/React Testing Library och/eller Cypress.io

 **Meriterande**

Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha jobbat med Code Review  

  

Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha jobbat nära UX med designsystem och verktyg så som Storybook  

  

Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling inom e-handelslösningar eller konto-hantering  

  

Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha jobbat i tvärfunktionella teams  

  

Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha jobbat med Cloud-tjänster så som Azure eller AWS


Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att bygga API-intergrationer och/eller BFF (Back end for front end)  

  

Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av analysverktyg såsom Matomo eller Google analytics  

  

Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta i monorepo-arkitektur tex. NX

  




**Om oss**


Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.


Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.


Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.


För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.


Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Mid-level Full Stack developer - Fully remote
description:
**Do you refer to yourself as a Fullstack, Full stack, or Full-Stack?**  

**Maybe generalist or Jack of all trades?**

 **Either way, we are taking applications to one of the best employers out there, if you're a seasoned Full Stack developer looking for your next "Forever" - Read more!**

 **OFFER**  

  

Paf is different from other game companies on the market. Founded by Save the Children and the Red Cross, they still donate their profits to these and several other organizations.


They strive for a long-term sustainable business and care about their employees, customers, and society; All profit goes to charity and responsible gaming is an important part of their business. And as an employer; nothing is more important than to make sure you have what you need to want to stay with them for the long term.


As a developer at Paf, you will work in a close-knit team with colleagues who share a passion for delivering top-quality products, enabling great gaming experiences for a global and diverse audience.


*What's in it for you?*

  

* **Remote Work Flexibility**: They adjust to where you want to work: 100% at the office, 100% remote work, or a mix where you’re at the office a few days a week with an option for up to 3 months of work abroad per year. You will be provided with a double set of office equipment (desk, chair, screens, docking station, and so on), so you have the same conditions at home and at the office.
* **Latest & Greatest tech:** they keep up with the latest tested technologies and phase out whatever is old. Check their Tech-radar out here:**https://tech-radar.paf.dev/**
* **Social Responsibility**: Paf values profitability but also gives back to society. Every penny of profit is donated to charity (approx. 40+ million/year)
* **Supportive Work Environment**: They prioritize providing challenges, free time, and resources to ensure a fulfilling work experience. They avoid overtime and it's no wonder their employees stay an average of over 10 years

**THE TEAM & JOB**  

The team you will be joining develops and maintains integrations for player registration and onboarding authentication using various methods. We are also responsible for managing Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) processes, ensuring compliance and safety for our users.

 *Check their* *tech-radar* *out to see which technologies are coming, which they use, and which they are phasing out.*


You will be involved in the entire development process, from requirement specification, creation of stories, estimations, development, testing, release, and maintenance. Over time, you are expected to understand the platform well enough to recommend necessary architecture changes and understand their long-term impact.

 **WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR**  

We are looking for a generalist developer and a go-getter who is enthusiastic about programming and infrastructure. You have the confidence to take your own initiative and collaborate well with others. The team you would be joining is highly experienced and characterized by an open-minded atmosphere where everyone is welcome to contribute.  

  

To be able to get the job done, we see it as necessary to have *3 years of experience* in multiple parts of the stack, and you are interested in learning new technologies and languages as needed.


Technically, you need to have experience with:

* Technologies such as **Node, Typescript, and React.**
* REST APIs and integrating front end with backend services

*Additional skills that would help get the job done:*

+ Infrastructure in the cloud, for example, **AWS and Cloudflare.**

  

  

**ABOUT PAF**

*Paf is a Nordic gaming company founded on Åland in 1966 to generate profit for the benefit of society. They were one of the first gaming companies to go online in 1999. Many of their games are exclusive to Paf and developed by their in-house Games Studio. They are an award-winning industry leader in responsible gaming. Their physical gaming operations include over 30 cruise ships crisscrossing the Baltic and North Seas.*  

  

*Paf has roughly 330 employees representing 29 nationalities, with offices located on Åland, in Helsinki, Stockholm, Riga, Tallinn, Oslo, Norrköping, Gzira, and Madrid. Paf (Ålands Penningautomatförening) is licensed and controlled by the Government of Åland.*

*In 2021, the Paf Group had a total turnover of 135 million euros and a profit of 34,3 million euros. More information at* *aboutpaf.com*  



  

**ABOUT PINETREE**  

At Pinetree, we have a vision and mission to differentiate ourselves from the crowd and are Sweden's contenders in talent search and matching.


By working as an agency, the value to you as an employee is that we have a very wide network of partner companies that we continuously ensure high-quality standards.

**This recruitment is direct employment at Paf and all applications, questions, administration, and Pinetree AB manages the recruitment process.**

title: Senior Ruby on Rails Developer for Aboard
description:
After bringing the Teamtailor ATS to 10,000 customers worldwide we are now ramping up our next big journey with our second product: Aboard!


At Teamtailor we’ve always been focused on enabling a great candidate experience, by building software that is personal, different, and kind. We want to help our customers extend that same care when candidates become employees. That’s where Aboard comes in, taking over when a candidate has been hired and enabling seamless onboarding and employee experience.


Aboard is still an early-stage product, built in Ruby on Rails by a small, experienced team of three developers and one designer. Now we’re looking for one more developer to help shape our next big product and how we build it.

**We are looking for…**
-----------------------

* An experienced full stack developer with very strong **Ruby on Rails** skills. Experience with **Stimulus.js** and **Tailwind CSS** is also a big plus.
* A Product-Minded Software Engineer with experience working in fast-moving startups.
* A self-motivated “manager of one” who enjoys being in the driver’s seat and seeing the impact of their work directly. A real Doer.


This is a hybrid remote role. We are only looking for candidates in Stockholm or Linköping, Sweden who enjoy working closely together with their colleagues from our great offices a few days per week.

**You will get…**
-----------------

* The joy of joining a small team in an early-stage product where your work has a huge impact! Working closely together with our early customers, and our sales and customer success teams, we are iterating fast to make sure we’re building a product that solves our customers needs and puts a smile on their faces.
* The perks of an established company with a working business model, such as job security, occupational pension, etc.

title: Utvecklare C# och C++
description:
**Är du en erfaren utvecklare med en passion för att ständigt lära dig och utvecklas?**

**Vi erbjuder:**

* **Utveckling och Lärande:** Vi ger dig utrymme och tid att utforska nya tekniker och kontinuerligt utvecklas i din roll.
* **Spännande Projekt:** Arbeta med stora namn inom Defence, Automotive, Telecom och fler. Vi skapar lösningar för allt från hemelektronik till industrimaskiner.
* **Samarbete och Långsiktighet:** Vi jobbar nära våra kunder och bygger relationer som varar. Många av våra kunder har varit med oss i över tio år.
* **Kollektivavtal:** Vi värnar om rättvisa och trygga arbetsförhållanden.

**Vem är du?**

* 5-15 års erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling.
* Flytande i C#/.NET och gärna kunnig i C++.
* Erfarenhet av både backend- och applikationsutveckling.
* Erfarenhet av Azure och verktygen kring Microsofts molntjänst.
* Du ska kunna arbeta säkerhetsklassat, då våra kunder kan komma att kräva detta.
* Erfarenhet av test är ett stort plus.
* **Lärandementalitet:** Den här rollen är för dig som aldrig slutar lära och alltid söker nya kunskaper och färdigheter.

**Vår Vision:** Vi kombinerar våra digitaliseringsfärdigheter för att skapa en hållbar och human framtid. Hos oss på Knowit Connectivity bidrar du till att forma framtiden för företag och samhälle.

**Ansök nu och var med på att skapa** **en mer uppkopplad och säkrare värld!**  

Ansökningar hanteras löpande så skicka in din ansökan redan idag eller kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Ansök redan idag eller hör av dig till ansvarig rekryterare: rasmus.lundin@knowit.se, eller konsultchef Mikael Holm: mikael.holm@knowit.se, +46 79 58 58 322 så berättar vi gärna mer om tjänsten eller våra andra karriärmöjligheter.

title: Embedded Software developer till Knowit
description:
Vill du utvecklas i spännande uppdrag tillsammans med duktiga kollegor och inlyssnande chefer? Då har du hittat rätt! Vi på Knowit Connectivity i Linköping växer och söker dig som vill jobba med fokus på bland annat **C/C++ och Linux**. Genom att vi kombinerar spetsteknologi med en stark affärsinsikt bygger vi innovativa och hållbara lösningar för våra spännande kunder. Vi skapar alltså en bättre morgondag och vill ha med dig!

**Vad du kan förvänta dig**


Att jobba hos oss är varierande och utöver att du får jobba med spännande kunder och teknik, får du möjligheten att växa tillsammans med ett härligt gäng duktiga kollegor. På vårt kontor i centrala Linköping finns det fyra affärsområden som alla jobbar inom IT, men som har olika bakgrund och erfarenheter. Vi tycker om att ha kul tillsammans på jobbet och även efter arbetstid med roliga AWs och aktiviteter. Tillsammans skapar vi en härlig atmosfär där mångfald och jämställdhet är en naturlig del av verksamheten.


Vi sitter i schyssta lokaler på Klostergatan/Sankt Larsgatan där vi värderar en fri kultur med nära kontakt med chefer och kollegor. Vi erbjuder dig en snabbrörlig, rolig och inspirerande arbetsplats där vi löser svåra problem tillsammans genom att vara ett stöttande team. Hos oss erbjuds du en trygg anställning med generösa hälso- och friskvårdsbidrag samt pensions- och försäkringsförmåner. Vi jobbar hårt med jämställdhet, miljö och hållbarhet och vi är stolta och glada över att både vara klimatneutrala och det mest jämställda börsnoterade bolaget.

**Om dig**


Vi söker dig med 5+ års erfarenhet av embeddedutveckling. Du ska ha jobbat med embedded, det vill säga kunna C och C++, och kunna jobba både nära hårdvara och högre upp i stacken. RTOS och Linux får inte vara obekanta områden för dig.


För att lyckas i rollen är det ett måste att kunna jobba säkerhetsklassat, då våra kunder kan komma att kräva detta. Vi arbetar med kunder inom Defence, Automotive, Telecom med flera, vilket innebär att erfarenhet från dessa branscher är meriterande.


Vi ser gärna att du har en teknisk utbildning i botten och ett starkt intresse för systemutveckling samt erfarenhet av design, kravhantering, utredningar och dokumentation. Du trivs med att arbeta i team och ser problemlösning som en laginsats. Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift är ett krav.

**Kort om Knowit Connectivity**


Knowit etablerades 1990 och har idag över 4000 medarbetare representerade i Sverige, Norge, Danmark, Finland, Tyskland och Polen. Inom affärsområdet Knowit Connectivity i Linköping är vi idag drygt 50 konsulter och vi utvecklar bland annat avancerade 5G-lösningar, designar framtida autonoma fordon och förändrar den uppkopplade världen. Hos oss får du chansen att delta i världsledande projekt och tillsammans med våra kunder forma framtiden.

**Kontakt och ansökan**


Vi vet hur många spännande jobb det finns där ute och kanske riktar sig inte denna annons helt till dina behov. Så om du tycker att denna roll inte riktigt är det som du är ute efter – tveka inte på att höra av dig till oss ändå. Det finns många spännande roller hos oss som bara väntar på att tillsättas! Du kan även följa oss på Linkedin här för att se vad som händer runt om på Connectivity.


Ansök redan idag eller hör av dig till ansvarig rekryterare: Rasmus Lundin: rasmus.lundin@knowit.se, eller konsultchef Mikael Holm: mikael.holm@knowit.se, +46 79 585 83 22 så berättar vi gärna mer om tjänsten eller våra andra karriärmöjligheter.

 Läs mer och se vad vi gör på vår Knowit Connectivity på vår linkedin

title: Senior Embedded Developer
description:
**Senior Embedded Developer**


Sightic is a pioneering tech company on a mission to revolutionize safety across multiple industries. Founded in 2019 by two entrepreneurs with backgrounds in the Swedish police and security forces, Sightic began by developing digital tools for drug and alcohol detection. Today, our market reach extends to the automotive industry, and safety-critical workplaces. Our innovative, machine-learning-based solutions are built on trusted and extensive research, and we collaborate with top talents to engineer smarter safety for a safer world.


**Job description**


Sightic is seeking an experienced Senior Embedded Developer to take a leading role in developing our software solutions for common ARM hardware platforms used in the automotive industry. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing embedded software, ensuring it meets the highest standards of safety, performance, and reliability. In this role, you’ll work closely with other developers, machine learning engineers, and data scientists to ensure seamless integration of ML models into real-time environments.


**Main responsibilities**


* Take a leading role in the development and optimization of software solutions for ARM-based embedded systems in automotive applications.
* Implement software in compliance with functional safety standards (ISO 26262) and ensure safety-critical requirements are met.
* Develop and maintain robust development pipelines using MISRA C++ for automotive software.
* Ensure scalability, performance, and reliability of embedded software in real-time environments.
* Lead debugging, troubleshooting, and optimization efforts for embedded software.

**Qualification requirements**

  

* Extensive experience in embedded software development for ARM platforms.
* Strong proficiency in C/C++ with deep knowledge of MISRA C++ development pipelines.
* Experience in developing safety-critical systems in compliance with ISO 26262.
* Experience with Embedded Linux, or other embedded OS’s (QNX, FreeRTOS etc).
* Solid understanding of real-time systems and their constraints in automotive applications.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field.

**Merited**

  

* Interest in AI and machine learning.
* Experience in developing CI/CD pipelines for embedded solutions.
* Knowledge of electronics design.
* Solid leadership skills.

**What we offer**

  

* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Flexible working conditions.
* A culture that champions innovation and continuous learning.
* Opportunities for professional development and advancement.

title: Systemutvecklare till Försäkringskassan i Sundsvall och Östersund
description:
Placeringsort
Flera orter
Diarienummer
FK 2024/021564  



*Varje år fattar Försäkringskassan 24 miljoner beslut som påverkar människors liv och hela samhället. Vi betalar ut cirka 250 miljarder kronor varje år. Det är allas skattepengar vi har hand om. Det är ett stort ansvar. Därför tänker vi nytt och använder den senaste tekniken för att förenkla och förbättra, utveckla och leverera it-tjänsterna för den svenska socialförsäkringen. Välkommen till en av Sveriges största it-avdelningar.*
Vi har för närvarande ett spännande projekt inom betalningsområdet där vi arbetar med att utveckla ett nytt betalsystem. Projektet drivs med hjälp av OpenShift och containerteknik. För att möta våra växande behov söker vi nu flera systemutvecklare, främst med erfarenhet av Java.



Samtidigt som vi utvecklar det nya systemet behöver vi även säkerställa att dagens system för utbetalningar fungerar smidigt. Därför letar vi också efter systemutvecklare med kompetens inom C++, samt personer med fokus på kravanalys och verksamhetskompetens inom socialförsäkringsförmåner.


**Java, C++, agila team, frontend, backend och kravanalys**
-----------------------------------------------------------



Som systemutvecklare kommer du att arbeta med utveckling av både frontend och backend i Java, där du deltar i hela processen från analys och design till implementation, testning och förvaltning. Du kommer även bidra till att skapa mjukvaruarkitektur för en skalbar infrastruktur med hjälp av OpenShift och Kubernetes.



Ett viktigt fokus är att säkerställa dagens omfattande utbetalningar och omvandla verksamhetsbehov till konkreta krav för it-systemen. För att möta dessa krav söker vi även systemutvecklare med C++-kompetens och erfarenhet av kravanalys.



Vi arbetar i agila team med stort ansvarstagande och ett ständigt fokus på förbättring. Samarbete, kvalitet och en god användarupplevelse är centralt i vårt arbete. Vi värdesätter din vilja att utvecklas och bidra till att förbättra servicen för medborgarna.



Tjänsten innebär att du hanterar sekretessbelagda uppgifter vilket ställer höga krav på rätt hantering. Därför är det viktigt att du som ska arbeta hos oss har högt säkerhetsmedvetande.



Det är ett jobb för dig som vill vara med och ta ansvar.



Vi söker dig som


* har högskoleexamen eller erfarenheter och kvalifikationer som kan prövas likvärdiga
* agerar på eget initiativ och tar ansvar för att nå goda resultat
* kommer med innovativa idéer och lösningar som främjar utveckling
* kan förstå och analysera komplexa frågor
* har ett systematiskt och noggrant arbetssätt
* samarbetar effektivt med andra för att nå gemensamma mål
* har god kommunikativ förmåga
* har goda kunskaper i svenska, i tal och skrift.


Det är meriterande om du


* har dokumenterad erfarenhet av utveckling i Java
* har dokumenterad erfarenhet av utveckling i C++
* har erfarenhet i programmen eller system: IntelliJ, Eclipse, Vue, Angular, Jenkins, Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, Git, SQL, Cucumber
* har erfarenhet av microtjänstlösningar i OpenShift och Kubernetes
* har erfarenhet av agilt arbetssätt
* har erfarenhet av DevOps
* har erfarenhet av ledarskap som teamledare
* har erfarenhet av test och testautomatisering
* har erfarenhet av testdriven utveckling (TDD)
* har erfarenhet av Försäkringskassans förmåner.


Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.


**Övrigt**
----------



Ett flertal tjänster, tillsvidare, heltid, med tillträde enligt överenskommelse. Provanställning kan bli aktuellt. Försäkringskassan kan komma att göra viss ekonomisk personkontroll innan anställning. För den här tjänsten krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Intervjuer sker löpande. Placeringsort: Sundsvall eller Östersund.



Vill du veta mer om Försäkringskassan som arbetsgivare? Besök fk.se/jobbahososs


**Kontaktpersoner**
-------------------



Chef: Stefan Bergsten, tel 010 118 71 96 eller Ewa Larsson-Snygg, tel 010 114 76 59 (för frågor om tjänsten). HR-specialist: Ahmad Mohsen tel 010- 113 45 24 (för frågor om rekryteringsprocessen). Fackliga representanter är för ST Anna-Lena Bahadori Lundgren, Saco-S Per Sandemalm och Eliza Grundström. Dessa nås via vår växel 08-786 90 00.


**Ansökan**
-----------



Välkommen med din ansökan senast den 30 oktober 2024. Ladda gärna upp dina examensbevis, betyg och intyg i samband med din ansökan.

title: Software Developer
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------


**About this opportunity:**

  

Our products are at the core of the mobile network, connecting radio networks with the internet and enabling seamless connectivity. In our development unit, you're part of the next step of our transformation: developing 5G networks with cloud native software for global telecom operators. At Packet Core, hundreds of talented developers work side by side, providing plenty of opportunities to learn from senior colleagues and develop your own competence. We take pride in our commitment to innovation and regularly set aside time for Hackathons, allowing you to pursue your own ideas or work with new friends on the next big thing. Our office is located at Lindholmen in central Göteborg, with beautiful scenery and modern facilities. We’re next to Chalmers and the University of Gothenburg, with other cutting-edge tech companies as our closest neighbors in a buzzing area. There are arenas for learning and networking at Lindholmen Science Park, and there is a wide range of restaurants for your convenience. As an Ericsson employee you enjoy all the benefits of a good collective agreement, as well as a personal health account, subsidized lunch, gyms in the house, and much more.


We are now looking for experienced software developers interested in building the applications in Ericsson’s 5G Core network, connecting mobile devices around the world to the internet. With us, you would join a small development team working with feature development, where tasks include requirement analysis, system design, development, and verification. As a team, you take ownership for your feature from analysis to delivery and beyond! As an experienced developer you contribute with solid software development skills and experience from professional product development. Previous exposure to the 3GPP telecom standards is also valuable. With us you will work with state-of-the-art methods, architecture and platforms for software development.

 **What you will do:**

  

* Develop high-quality software meeting telecom standards using Erlang
* Analyze requirements and propose software designs
* Analyze verification needs and develop test cases validating your design
* Develop test case automation Execute tests, find, and fix faults
* Actively share information and collaborate with team and product owner

 **The skills you bring:**

  

* Master’s or bachelor’s degree in Computer Software Engineering or similar field
* Skills in software development, preferably knowledgeable in more than one programming language
* Experience of agile development and the Scrum framework
* Experience of large-scale software development projects
* Knowledge of Microservice Architecture, Git, Gerrit, Jenkins, HTTP2, TCP/IP, Linux, Containers
* Used Erlang or other functional languages
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Göteborg

title: Javascript/Fullstack Engineer
description:
**Who We Are:**
 Schibsted Media is the largest media group in Scandinavia including world-class media houses like VG and Aftonbladet.
   

  

 The Data Platform team is a part of the Data & AI division, centrally positioned within Schibsted Media, and committed to driving innovation and delivering exceptional value. Our mission is to establish Schibsted as a data-driven pioneer. Our main responsibility is collecting and distributing behavioural data across all of Schibsted Media by developing and maintaining Pulse - our in-house behavioural data streaming and management system. We serve billions of events daily with minimum latency to ensure our newsrooms always have the latest information at their fingertips. We also plan to develop a new data platform based on the latest technologies that will serve as a foundation for Schibsted Media’s Data Mesh.
   

  

**The Role:**
 We are looking for a Javascript Engineer who has completed more than a few features together with their team and is also respectfully proactive in taking ownership of and investigating the “whys” of things.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
* Maintain and improve our data collection capabilities of Pulse (SDKs and applications) together with our senior engineers.
* Assist our internal customers in using our SDKs - we have many dev teams in Schibsted Media and it is crucial to our success to help them use our platform in the best way possible.
* Help us design and implement our new Schibsted Media Data Platform.
* Implement data security and privacy best practices - with the support of our security and privacy experts.


**Our tech stack:**
* Our main programming languages are Typescript, Javascript, Scala, Kotlin, Java, and Swift. The front end is based on React, Material-UI, and Nodejs API.
* Our infrastructure is mainly built using AWS services (S3, Cloudfront, Cloudformation, Route53, dynamoDB, ALB, PostgreSQL), Kubernetes, Aiven Kafka, Datadog, Humio, Artifactory, and Github. For data analytics and streaming, we use e.g. AWS, Snowflake, AWS Lambda, and Kafka.


**Who You Are:**
* You have a strong proficiency in modern JavaScript, applied to a React/Typescript ecosystem, including bundling packages and publishing them to npm.
* You are experienced in working with data from a variety of storage technologies (like PostgreSQL and DynamoDB).
* You have basic knowledge of the architecture and design of microservices and cloud infrastructure (patterns, reliability, scalability, quality).
* You are comfortable with deploying and operating services in a cloud environment.
* You have a proven track record of gathering and interpreting requirements, solving technical problems, and learning new technologies and code practices.
* At least a Bachelor’s degree or similar relevant work experience in a quantitative field such as computer science, informatics, applied mathematics, or statistics
* Good communication skills with fluency in English.


**Nice to have:**
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform.
* Familiarity with DevOps, concurrent/multithreaded programming, or distributed systems are all advantageous.
* Experience with any of the following areas: AWS, Kubernetes, and large-scale data pipelines.
* Interest in Big Data and would like to develop yourself in the Data Engineering area.
* Good understanding of developing and maintaining JavaScript/TypeScript SDK or library code for real users (e.g. open-source projects).
* An interest in DevEx (Developer Experience) – how do we make better products by helping other developers?
* A passion for metrics, monitoring, and code "transparency".


**Why Join Us?**
* A high degree of influence in shaping and developing your role further.
* A creative and up-to-date environment that offers great learning opportunities and active engineering communities.
* Flexible working hours and a hybrid work mode, with offices in Oslo and Stockholm.
* International environment with colleagues from around the globe.
* Comprehensive health insurance and wellness offers.
* Insider access to premium news and podcasts.


**Our Interview Process:**
* Recruiter screening (30 min): An initial call with a talent acquisition partner or the team's manager. We’ll tell you a bit about us, answer any questions you may have, learn about your background and what you’re looking to do.
* Home assignment and code review (60 min): a take-home exercise with a follow-up discussion where you meet two of our engineers. We will provide preparation material and context beforehand. The time commitment for completing the home assignment is not more than 3 hours of work.
* Values interview (45 min): meeting the Engineering Manager and Product Manager of the team for a short discussion, such as figuring out whether you’d enjoy being a teammate focusing on your previous experiences as a teammate in various situations.
* Offer extended! If you are interested in talking to more potential coworkers or have additional questions, we will also arrange any additional chats for you.

title: Full stack developer Intern
description:
Join the Revolution of Online Education at Coursfy!
   

  

 Are you a passionate aspiring Full Stack Developer looking to make a significant impact in the world of online education? Do you thrive in dynamic, innovative environments where your skills can directly shape the future of learning? If so, we have an exciting internship opportunity for you!
   

  

**About Coursfy**
 Coursfy is an innovative e-learning platform designed to provide maximum freedom to both instructors and learners. We emphasize flexibility, creativity, and autonomy, empowering instructors to deliver unique educational experiences and allowing learners to tailor their educational journeys. Our platform is built on advanced technology and is committed to delivering a seamless, intuitive user experience that prioritizes ease of use.
   

  

 Why Join Coursfy?
   

  

* Innovative Environment: Be a part of a cutting-edge platform that is redefining online education.
* Impactful Work: Your contributions will directly enhance the learning experience for millions of users worldwide.
* Ease of Use: Help create and maintain a platform known for its user-friendly interface, making education accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
* Collaborative Culture: Join a team of passionate professionals dedicated to making a difference.
* Career Growth: Gain valuable experience and professional development in a supportive learning environment.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Assist in developing and maintaining robust, scalable web applications using the latest technologies.
* Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers to create a seamless user experience.
* Implement responsive design principles to ensure our platform is optimized for all devices.
* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
* Troubleshoot and debug issues to improve platform performance.
* Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends.


**Requirements**
* Proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, Next.js, JavaScript, React.js, Redux, etc.).
* Experience with back-end development (Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, etc.).
* Familiarity with databases (SQL, NoSQL) and web servers.
* Knowledge of RESTful APIs, Axios APIs, MUI, and microservices architecture.
* Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Familiarity with AWS


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with AI-powered recommendation systems.
* Knowledge of e-learning platforms and educational technologies.


 Coursfy is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
   

  

 Join us in our mission to empower educators and learners worldwide. Apply today and help us shape the future of online education!
   

  

**For more information or questions please contact us at** 
 M.eddin@coursfy.com or phone number +46733697689

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:

We are also automating work for psychologists so they can spend more time with their patients.

 Please apply right away, we will reach out to you within 2 days.

title: Senior Frontend Developer (React.js)
description:
**Company Description** 




 IDI Profiling is a pioneer in the field of interpersonal dynamics, developing the Interpersonal Dynamics Inventory (IDI) to empower individuals and teams with deeper self-awareness and social intelligence. By understanding how others perceive us, IDI enables better decision-making, improved collaboration, and the cultivation of key interpersonal skills that drive success. At IDI Profiling, we are committed to fostering a culture where people can develop actionable insights into their behavior and interaction within teams. Our innovative tools help shape not just professionals but also high-performing organizations.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 We are seeking a talented and experienced Senior Frontend Developer (React.js) to join our Stockholm team. In this full-time role, with opportunities for remote work, you will spearhead the development of user-friendly, high-performance web applications using React.js. Your role will be crucial in translating intuitive design into high-quality code while ensuring seamless functionality across multiple browsers and devices. You'll collaborate with backend developers to integrate APIs and enhance the overall product experience, contributing directly to IDI Profiling’s mission to improve workplace dynamics through innovative digital tools.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design and implement responsive user-facing features using React.js, optimizing for performance and scalability.
* Translate wireframes and visual designs into efficient, reusable, and high-quality code.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, ensuring seamless integration of APIs and backend services.
* Ensure consistent user experience across various platforms and devices, adhering to the highest standards of web development.
* Contribute to the continual improvement of our front-end architecture, tooling, and testing processes.
* Work closely with UX/UI designers to create intuitive, visually appealing, and highly functional interfaces.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Extensive experience in React.js and JavaScript, with a solid understanding of HTML5 and CSS3.
* Strong ability to translate designs and wireframes into efficient, maintainable code.
* Expertise in responsive web design, with a focus on delivering smooth experiences across a wide range of devices.
* Proven track record working with RESTful APIs and understanding of modern authorization mechanisms.
* Passion for problem-solving, attention to detail, and a strong sense of ownership over your work.
* Effective communication skills, with a collaborative mindset and the ability to work both independently and in teams.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related fields (or equivalent experience).



  





**Why IDI Profiling?** 




 At IDI Profiling, you’ll be more than just a developer – you’ll be a key player in shaping how organizations develop interpersonal skills. You’ll have the opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge solutions designed to enhance communication, leadership, and social intelligence in the workplace. We believe in creating a supportive environment where creativity and innovation thrive, making it an exciting space for your professional growth. Join us in our mission to empower individuals and organizations to better understand themselves and each other.

title: Frontend developer to big bank in Stockholm!
description:
This is a exciting role where you get the chance to grow and work with modern technologies as well as working at the largest financial group in the Nordic region and one of Europe's largest banks!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 According to the agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 As a Frontend developer you will be a part of our clients Platform team. You’ll join a highly capable, diverse and distributed team of senior developers spanning all the Nordics and Poland. You will be a part of a team thats provide an internal Platform as a Service in the bank. Their focus is on standardization of the software development process and CI/CD across different projects. The platform focuses on delivering on-prem Kubernetes clusters and on-prem Cloud services as well as opens up for Public cloud services.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* You'll get the opportunity to join a team of experts and learn from senior colleagues, as well as increase your skills as a Frontend developer.
  
* The opportunity to develop and advance in your career. As well as working at a global company which value a sustainable workplace, work-life balance and a diverse workplace.
  
* A dedicated consultant manager from Academic Work who will support and coach you in your career. This is a long term assignment at our client and you'll have an ongoing employment at Academic Work.
  

  


**Work tasks**

 The team is responsible for the Portal that is the main point of contact for developers through which they use the platform. That means they deliver their own application, called Portal, based on Spotify Backstage, and this is a NodeJS and React based application. You will are work with some Python APIs, Ansible Automation backends, where you build integrations towards variety of dozens of tools in the ecosystems to make them available for developers to be used from Portal.
 


  

  
* Supporting and developing the User Interface for observability and interaction tool to manage Application Lifecycle, CICD process and Hosting Platform used by Software Developers and DevOps teams
  
* Keeping charge of visual consistency of the platform (e.g. making sure plugins developed by other teams are in line with base design and follow UX good practices)
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* You who have work experience as a developer with good NodeJS and React skills
  
* You who have knowledge about hosting and CICD processes and toolset will be a plus (e.g. Kubernetes, Tekton, ArgoCD, Jenkins)
  
* You who have good communication skills in English (written and spoken)
  
* Swedish citizenship or a valid work permit enabling immediate start in the position.
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**
  

 used to proactively seek knowledge, promote collaboration and sparring within a team and across teams.
   

 Are a highly innovative problem solver with strong analytical and customer service abilities.
 


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Sofie Gillberg or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stv2@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15107216

title: Software Engineer (Scala), Supply and Demand Team
description:
**Job Description**
 At the large scale of the Wolt business, our operational efficiency benefits greatly from having automation for managing supply (how many courier partners are online) and demand (how many orders are being placed by customers). For us supply balance is a clear win-win situation, but it takes an entire team to make sure that this is possible. 💪 To succeed even better with supply balance, we are adding one more Backend Engineer to our new Supply and Demand team!
   

  

 Supply and Demand team’s mission is to make Wolt cities efficient for our customers, merchants and couriers, as well as making running the cities smooth for our operations people. This is done by building tools and features that help achieve balance between supply (number of Courier Partners online) and demand (home delivery orders from consumers) by surfacing the forecasts to our Courier Partners in the Courier App and Wolt operations, as well as creating ways to dynamically influence supply and demand. As a backend engineer you will have a chance to work on topics around, for example, courier engagement and activation bonuses. That can be fun and rewarding for several reasons:
   

  

* This field encourages innovative approaches and experimentation. You can try out new methodologies to see what works best.
* You often collaborate with various teams such as applied science, analytics, product management, and operations.
* Designing systems to optimize courier activation and bonuses involves solving complex logistics and machine learning problems.
* The need for real-time solutions means you often work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.


 At the moment, the team consists of two frontend developers, several backend engineers and applied scientists as well as the engineering team lead and product lead. The main programming languages on the team are Python, Scala, and TypeScript (React) and since the team also works closely with Applied Scientists, this is a great chance to learn a lot about machine learning if you have a knack for it!
   

  

 This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Stockholm, or Berlin or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, Germany, or Estonia. Read more about our remote setup here.
   

  

**Our humble expectations**
 👉 You have solid experience designing, building, and integrating quality software (microservices) in Scala on a large scale within a complex domain, with strong focus on event-driven approach where the decisions need to be made in an online way.
   

  

 👉 You have knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, observability (DataDog or similar tools) and data storage, both SQL and noSQL databases. We are actively using multiple solutions: postgresql, dynamodb, mongo, redis.
   

  

 👉 You’re a dedicated person who is pragmatic with a positive attitude, who doesn't shy away from going outside of their comfort zone, and demonstrates curiosity and willingness to keep continuously learning.
   

  

 👉 You’re comfortable working with real-world data and its different nuances.
   

  

 So, TL;DR if you have several years of experience in dealing with the back end of the house, can’t wait to learn new things, have an interest in tackling scalability challenges and building some cool stuff, then be sure to drop us a line! 📫
   

  

**Next Steps**
 💯 Overall our product organization consists of a team of over 800 people at Wolt. We aim to build none other than the best-in-the-world engineering team here.
   

  

 💙 You’ll get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognise that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind, and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement.
   

  

 🙌 Join us for an exciting journey! The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash equity. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.
   

  

 For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Lina Muncyte (lina.muncyte(at)wolt.com).

title: Associate Software Engineer
description:
Frostbite is EA's state-of-the-art multi-platform game development engine. Our global team develops creative engine features and cutting-edge tools that let our game makers create stunning games. We're honoured to have thousands of game developers worldwide using Frostbite as they create some of the industry's best-known titles and amazing player experiences. Join us as we help shape the future of gaming with Frostbite.
 



  





**This is a hybrid role and you will be required to work in our Stockholm office 1/2 days per week** 




  





 You will be a part of our team building main systems for data management and game asset processing that make our tools responsive and stable for thousands of users editing millions of assets. Some examples of what we work with are:
 



  




* The system that provides on-disk data to our editor
* The pipeline for creating game-ready data from raw or source data
* A caching system for built data to increase efficiency
* A service for On-demand loading of large game data



  





 This team belongs to the Production Systems domain that creates tools, frameworks and services that EA's content creators rely on to create and enhance EA's games. You'll find opportunities to improve content creator workflows, allowing faster iteration times and creativity for our engineers content creators. You will report to our Engineering Manager.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




  




* Communicate with game and other Frostbite teams around the world to understand their specific needs
* Work collaboratively on design, test, and maintenance of services delivered by the team
* Gain domain expertise and share knowledge within the team.
* Produce documentation covering the usage and technological decisions of your work.



  





  





**Required Skills and Experience** 




  




* 2+ years of experience with C++ programming, data-guided design, and software architecture
* Experience with agile development practices
* Good collaboration skills



  





**Desirable Skills and Experience** 




  




* Experienced in building high-performing concurrent software
* Experience implementing databases or file systems
* Some experience with web services running locally and in Azure
* Some experience with content pipelines

title: Backend Software Engineer - Stores
description:
**Summary**
 This is an exciting opportunity for an exceptional software engineer passionate about open source software, Linux, and Web Services at scale. Come build a rewarding, meaningful career working with the best and brightest people in technology at Canonical, a growing international software company.
   

  

 Canonical's Store team develops and operates a large system of backend services that power the Snap Store and Charmhub.io marketplaces. Our services are built primarily in Python, with a bit of Golang.
   

  

 We have some exciting challenges ahead including continuing to scale our production architecture, significantly expanding the range of software we can deliver through the system powering our marketplaces, and enhancing our offering for the booming world of IoT and for large Enterprise solutions.
   

  

 If you have a passion for clean APIs, have a bias towards shipping, and believe that automated tests are the key to higher velocity and reliability, you'll fit right in.
   

  

**What you'll do**
* Collaborate remotely with a globally distributed team.
* Write clean web service APIs to support both CLI and web frontend clients, using Python (and optionally Golang).
* Design and implement new features and enhancements from spec to production and ongoing operations at scale.
* Review code and technical designs produced by other engineers.
* Discuss ideas and collaborate on finding good solutions.
* Work remotely with global travel for 2 to 4 weeks for internal and external events.


**Who you are**
* You have demonstrated professional proficiency in developing public-facing APIs and web applications using Python.
* You have a broad technology base but favour backend code and infrastructure.
* You know your way around relational and non-relational databases and can effectively design data models that perform well, and tune queries to access them.
* You are comfortable with Ubuntu as a development and deployment platform.
* You have demonstrated strong academic performance in Computer Science, STEM or a similar degree.
* You love technology and working with a diverse set of talented people.
* You are curious, flexible, articulate, and accountable.
* You value soft skills and are passionate, enterprising, thoughtful, and self-motivated.


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a growing, international software company that works with the open-source community to deliver Ubuntu -- the world's #1 cloud operating system. Our mission is to realise the potential of free software in the lives of individuals and organisations. Our services are helping businesses worldwide to reduce costs, improve efficiency and enhance security with Ubuntu. Canonical is a unique tech company - global, remote-first, open source, with 700 professionals across 50 countries - we want to be the world's best, not biggest, global software company. With almost every team remote by default, Canonical sets the pace on the 21st-century digital workplace.
   

  

**What Canonical offers:**
* Work from home
* Learning and development allowances
* Competitive salary
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Generous annual leave
* Paid maternity, paternity and sick leave
* Priority Pass for travel
* Exposure to international business and technology


*We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.*
 #stack

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
Build a first class device management platform for large device fleets at Quandify!
 



  





**🌏 About Us** 




 At Quandify, we're more than just a tech company. With our patented, state-of-the-art technology, we're at the forefront of revolutionizing leakage detection and water monitoring. Our seamless integration of cutting-edge hardware and software solutions pushes the boundaries of water management possibilities. The future is green, and with our products, customers have seen a decrease of up to 30% in water usage, contributing to a sustainable environment and avoiding unnecessary renovation caused by water damage.
 



  





**📱Who are you?** 




 You are a skilled backend developer who gets excited about large device fleets and enjoy building tools for others to use. It is meritorious to have experience in working with agile product development in commercial environments. Apart from being experienced in developing, testing and deploying cloud-native applications, you'll be diving into an exciting world where your expertise meets innovation head-on and exploration of the latest cheese. Your abilities also encompass building CI/CD pipelines and managing infrastructure as code. You find the dynamic and challenging setting of a scaleup environment appealing and consider it a place where your problem-solving skills and motivation can thrive. If you want to be a part of developing a state of the art Device Management Platform, handling tens of thousands of sensors, this may be your chance!
 



  





**What do we offer?** 



* Work closely with the commercial and hardware team in developing new features - full product lifecycle under one roof.
* Full ownership of software development lifecycle, from development to deployment and operations.
* Lab day - spend one day each month to develop your skills and experiment with new technology without pressure to deliver.
* A hybrid work environment with flexible work hours.



  





**Your Skillset** 



* Strong skills in one of the major cloud computing platforms, preferably with GCP.
* Strong skills in backend development, preferably in Java or Golang
* Strong skills in using infrastructure as code solutions, preferably Kubernetes or Helm.
* Experience with automated testing and CI/CD in something like GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions or Jenkins.
* Knowledge of frontend development with React and React Native is a plus.



  





**The technologies we utilise includes** 



* Kubernetes
* Java springboot
* Kafka / Pulsar
* Google Cloud Platform
* PostgreSQL
* Redis
* React and React Native for web portals and mobile app
* Terraform
* MQTT
* GitLab



  





 🤔 Not a 100% match? No worries! We believe in potential over checkboxes. We know that talent can't always be defined by a resume. If you’re passionate about what we're achieving at Quandify and have some of the skills, but not all, we still want to hear from you.
 



  





  





 🚀 Ready to make waves in the sustainable tech industry? Drop your resume, and let's start this journey together. We're excited to get to know the genius in you!

title: Embedded Software Engineer to Life Science start-up
description:
Here you have the opportunity to be part of something special! We're on the lookout for a Software Engineer to join our partner and their passionate team of experts. If you're enthusiastic about breaking new ground and immersing yourself in cutting-edge technology within the research field, this is the opportunity you've been longing for. Seize the chance to be part of something extraordinary!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Technology
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, office hours
 



  

**Start date :**
 As soon as possible
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 Our partner has rapidly expanded their business, achieving remarkable success in the field of Life Sciences. Picture yourself contributing to the development of a groundbreaking Life Science product that is set to redefine the industry. The start-up is a passionate organisation of approximately 50 individuals that work together in the development-phase with the mission to launch a cutting-edge Life Science product.
 


  


 You will be part of a dedicated team composed of four experienced and talanted Software Engineers. Together you will collaborate in the early software development setting up the architecture and designing the the software related to the product and its hardware.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* A part of an organisation destined for greatness
  
* Projects focused on new technologies and products
  
* A dedicated Consultant Manager that cares about your personal och professional development
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Designing and developing software, including hardware control and analysis SW
  
* Participate in code reviews, create unit tests, and engage in various activities to ensure the development of high-quality software
  
* Planning and executing software development projects
  
* Work actively in the code base with Python
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* A candidate with a MsC in Software Engineering, Mechatronics, Computer Science or similar
  
* Work life experience of working with product development and embedded systems
  
* Up-to-date programming skills in Python within Linux environment
  
* Fluent in English both in writing and verbally since it is the language used with colleagues and customers
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* Experience of working with product development within the Life Science industry
  
* Skills in DevOps and setting up CI/CD pipelines
  
* Fluent in Swedish both in writing and verbally
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  


 You are communicative and collaborative, and you enjoy working in a goal-oriented environment and on projects with cross-functional teams. You have a proactive, entrepreneurial mindset and have a sense of urgency and have the tools to create and maintain a culture of innovation and excellence. It is important that you have strong teamwork skills and an analytical and pragmatic approach. You are friendly, positive, and fun to work with, and you enjoy working in a fast-paced, changing environment.
 


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Erik Gund or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on sth4@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15106278

title: Fullstack utvecklare till innovativt SAAS bolag!
description:
Som fullstack utvecklare hos Visionera får du möjligheten att växa och utvecklas med tiden, tillsammans med duktiga och trevliga kollegor på det centralt belägna kontoret vid Odenplan. Du kommer få stor inblick i företaget och spela en viktig roll för den fortsatta tillväxtresa. För dig som trivs i en miljö fylld med innovation, energi och utmaningar är Visionera rätt plats!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Visionera Aktiebolag
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Visionera är ett innovativt mjukvaruföretag som utvecklar verksamhetsstödssystem för alla typer av företag och industrier. De har stor erfarenhet av att hjälpa sina kunder att effektivisera interna processer med olika former av IT-produkter och support. Visionera är idag ledande inom SAAS tjänster och erbjuder dessutom konsulttjänster i sin tjänst- och produktportfölj. Det är ett mindre företag med höga mål och stort hjärta. Beslutsvägarna är korta och du kommer att få en god inblick i hela företagets verksamhet där dina tankar och idéer värdesätts. Visioneras kunder finns över hela världen!
   

 ”På Visionera lär man sig något nytt varje dag, med högt i tak arbetar vi på att utvecklas tillsammans kontinuerligt. Man får också vara med och påverka direkt i en platt organisation och vara drivande i arbetet framåt med produkterna” - Mattias Larsson, Lead Developer
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En god introduktion, vidareutbildningar och mentor för att du på bästa sätt ska komma in i arbetet och utvecklas tillsammans med Visionera
  
* Ett jobb där ditt privatliv värdesätts. Vi tror att du mår som bäst och presterar som bäst när du får tid för träning, gaming, familj eller andra saker som just du brinner för.
  
* Visar du framfötterna är möjligheterna oändliga! Här kan du växa som person och i din roll, samt ta del av andra aspekter av produktutvecklingen. Det finns exempelvis möjligheter att på sikt arbeta som senior utvecklare, team lead, eller inom test eller UX design.
  
* Visionera säljer sin egen produkt vilket innebär att säljare och supporten sitter bredvid dig och därmed är du nära kunderna och ser produkten leva.
  


  


 Hos Visionera arbetar du med den egenutvecklade SAAS applikation, VisionFlow. Detta system används både av Visionera själva samt av kunderna i deras arbetsprocesser. VisionFlow är ett system för ITSM, ärendehantering och CRM som effektiviserar verksamheter och förenklar kommunikationen mellan avdelningar och team i en gemensamt lösning. VisionFlow kan även integreras med andra system vilket gör att det blir ännu mer kraftfullt. Tack vare VisionFlows konkurrenskraft är Visionera uppe och spelar med de större aktörer trots att de är ett mindre företag. Då systemet är stort och utvecklas från grunden in-house på Visionera, så kommer du som utvecklare sällan känna att du gör samma sak om och om igen trots att du arbetar med samma produkt. Här arbetar du projektbaserat med kundspecifika anpassningar av VisionFlow för att ge kunden den bästa lösningen för sin verksamhet och få ut så mycket som möjligt från sitt användande av VisionFlow.
   




**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Utveckla gränssnitt i Sencha EXT JS (ett Javascript ramverk)
  
* Utveckla ny funktionalitet i systemet, både på klient- och serversidan
  
* Arbeta med infrastruktur, drift och underhåll av systemlösningen tillsammans med kollegorna i DevOps-teamet
  
* Support och åtgärd av buggar
  
* Utveckla och förbättra mobilappen för systemet
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en avslutad civil- eller högskoleingenjörsexamen inom datateknik eller motsvarande område
  
* Har goda kunskaper i Java och JavaScript
  
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med databaser så som MSSQL och MySQL, samt en vilja att lära dig mer inom området
  
* Har grundläggande kunskaper av webbutveckling, CSS och HTML
  
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift då du använder dig av båda språken i ditt arbete
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Har minst ett års arbetslivserfarenhet som systemutvecklare
  
* Har hobbyprojekt att visa upp
  
* Erfarenhet av infrastruktur eller intresse för att lära dig
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Målmedveten
  
* Stabil
  
* Ansvarstagande
  
* Respektfull
  


  

  

**Rekryteringsprocessen**
  

  
* Personlighets- och probemlösningsstest (ca. 40 min)
  
* Telefonintervju med Academic Work (10- 15 min)
  
* Digital intervju med Academic Work (1 h)
  
* 1a intervju med Visionera (ca. 1h)
  
* Kodtest
  
* 2a intervju med Visionera (ca. 1h)
  
* Referenser + Beslut
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Visionera Aktiebolag**

 Läs mer om Visionera här !
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Visionera Aktiebolag**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
